name: HealthMEDX
overview: HealthMEDX, Inc. offers home care, long-term care, and rehab software solutions. It offers CareMEDX, a suite of knowledge management solutions. The company also provides knowledge management, digital dashboard, workflow, analytics, telephony, and electronic medical record solutions. In addition, it offers WebCARE+, a Web-based software that automates patient management and scheduling. HealthMEDX has strategic alliances with National Association for Home Care & Hospice; Missouri Alliance for Home Care; Associated Home Health Industries of Florida; California Association for Health Services at Home; Homecare Information Technology Council; American Health Care Association; American Association of Homes and Services for the Aging; Center for Aging Services Technologies; National Association for the Support of Long Term Care; Illinois Health Care Association; Florida Health Care Association; Texas Healthcare Association; Dial N Document; BKD; Aleckna & Associates; and KPM Technology, LLC. It serves national post-acute care, skilled nursing, assisted living, independent living, adult day care, continuing care retirement, multi-facility chains, sole proprietor, and for-profit and not-for-profit sectors. The company was formerly known as Intermed, Inc. HealthMEDX, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is based in Ozark, Missouri.

milestones.description: HealthMEDX acquired by Spectrum Equity Investors and Trident Capital.
